tool_description: Rest API To get Mutasi/Statement from Indonesian Bank
name: Mutasi Bank API
title: Mutasi Bank API

api_list.name: listMutasi
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mutasi-bank-api1.p.rapidapi.com/list-settlements/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mutasi-bank-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
